p.k: While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a wrestling match for real – until a wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge. / While trying to film his own indie film, Ben accidentally allows the Bug Gang to go free. / When Ben attempts to stay up all night for a 24/7 theme park, he fails to utilize his alien powers to stay awake. / When Ben interferes with malicious magician Hex’s quest for the earth-moving Titan Gloves at a swap meet, he inadvertently switches bodies with Gwen… / During a tour of historic Oldeville, Ben finds a rare Sumo Slammers card, but when Billy Billions comes to claim the same card, Ben has to battle Billy’s high-tech drones.
